System Requirements:

Minimum:

CPU: 1.4 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalent
RAM: 256 MB (for Vista, 1 GB highly recommended)
VGA: OpenGL 1.3 compatible 64 MB AGP with hardware T&L
DX: DirectX 9 or higher
OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7
HDD: 540 MB free space
Sound: DirectX compatible soundcard

Recommended:

CPU: 2.4 GHz Pentium 4 or better
RAM: 512 MB

DX: DirectX 9 or higher
OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7

Recommended peripheral: DirectX compatible gamepad or steering wheel
